Title: Paper Towns
Writer: Scott Neustadter (screenplay by), Michael H. Weber (screenplay by), John Green (based on the book by)
Actors: Nat Wolff, Cara Delevingne, Austin Abrams, Justice Smith
Plot: After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.
